stories.text:
There's a common approach to landing pages which involves an invitation to "Start Now!" but any mention of pricing is obscured.

Whenever I see this it actually pisses me off and makes me less likely to engage.

Anyone out there who's A/B'd these things and can talk to the business benefits of putting off any mention of price ?
stories.title: Ask HN: Does hiding the pricing help with customer takeup?
Will the pandemic fade into an ordinary disease like the flu?

stories.text: I have an idea for a new software business and an early prototype, but I do not know where to start looking for potential investors. I have plenty of engineering experience, but I am not well connected with VCs. What is the best way to break into the venture startup space?
stories.title: Ask HN: How have you as a founder secured an investment?
